attributes.title: Really really horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Worst read I’ve ever had actually. It’s impossible to work and even more impossible to actually understand the claims being made seeing as they’re so idiotic. I guess it’s what’s to be expected coming from an administration full of really really stupid people but.

attributes.title: ✨#orangepresident✨
attributes.review: I was very excited to download this app to support our ✨wonderful✨ president. but when i opened it i was met with a scary middle aged man that has taken too many trips to the tanning salon. then i thought, hey my mom always told me “you are what you eat” so maybe  he’s just an undercover orange. oh well bad app i was very scared and i have so many nightmares now. DO NOT DOWWNLOAD SCARY SCARY

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I really wanted to see what my President was posting. But it wouldn’t let me get in the app. I am not from Gen Z trying to take down the app👀. It crashes so much. It makes my whole phone glitch. Drains my battery in 15 minutes. And gave me a virus Phovid19. And I’m sure my phone won’t work anymore. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Hahahha you though
attributes.review: There is more gen z then anyone try stopping try us you orange tangerine you are a horrible racist manipulating person the app device and quality is terrible it almost broke my phone it forced me to vote and text spam calls and to many ads when I deleted I still had problems🤢🤮👿🤬

attributes.title: This app just wasn’t it
attributes.review: I go on there right and his orange Cheeto puff face shows up and the national anthem started playing and I was like bro that’s some creepy stuff I ain’t doing that so I delete the app and then my whole phone just starts tripping up and it won’t let me get any calls and Donald Trump motivational speakers kept texting me and I was so done😌

attributes.title: 🧚😚✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: I am so disappointed in the ✨orange✨ of our country. This app is trash. it took 2 days to download. I honestly feel bad for this guy. jk jk he deserves it. but this app is to cunfusing and i just canny with it. The format is trash. I think that he should work harder and not work harder on young children. he makes me so sick. anyways trump 2020🧚‍♂️✨😘 (no we need a good president)

attributes.title: Don’t ban TikTok
attributes.review:
This is a horrible app I got it to try and learn more about our orange presidents plans and it was very difficult. This guy doesn’t deserve an app so this app should be deleted right away.                                 🍊
                                          👔
                                          👖
                                          👟
We should not have this ^ as our president

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: The app has great info and is very easy to navigate. It is kinda cluttered to begin with but as soon as you figure it out it’s a great app.

attributes.title: This app gave me mental health issues
attributes.review: My initial plans were to see what this app was about. As soon as I entered the app I heard screaming from the other side of my house. I went to investigate. I will never forget what I had seen that day. I'm currently in extensive therapy sessions to deal with my trauma and swear on my life that I will never download this app again.

attributes.title: Trash app
attributes.review: This app is so bad. Having the iPhone X doesn’t even make the app better. Way too many crashes, unnecessary downloads, etc. Not only that but it’s notifications are awful. Things nobody even cares about. Thank you for reading because I’m tryna take this app down with a million others :)
